title: Why, after fighting for permits to allow streets to connect to Clear Run Drive, does Autumn Hall now have the right to block these streets from neighborhood traffic?  Bordering College Acres neighbors put up a lot of good arguments to keep these streets from being built but Autumn Hall won the rights anyway after countering with the benefits the bordering neighborhoods would receive by these street access\'.  Somehow there seems to be a lot of double standards.
